Everything you need in one integrated solution

Over 55 years old? It's time to act now.

For over 55 SMSF QROPS Transfers We will:

  • Advise if it is worth transferring and why
  • Establish a QROPS registered SMSF to ensure a transfer can occur
  • Provide a fully integrated (UK & Australia) transfer service to ensure your funds are deposited into your Australian Fund in an efficent and compliant manner
  • Provide post transfer advice to ensure you integrate the funds appropriately and to allow you to maximise your ability to meet your finacial goals and objectives
Get started Keep me informed

Between 45 and 54? Time to prepare

We will provide strategic advice to maximise your future transfer options & retirement position by:

  • Considering locking away historically high cash equivalent rransfer values and to protect the ability to transfer in the future
  • Considering what can be implemented in Australia and the UK to ensure you can maximise your ability to achieve your long term objectives
  • Providing strategies to assist those of you with large transfer values and likely to breach the current and proposed Australian contribution limits
  • Maximising your British State Pension and Australian Centrelink entitlements
Contact our experts Keep me informed

Under 45? You're a way off being able to transfer, but we can still assist you.

We will help you plan to meet your retirement objectives by:

  • Structuring your finances to allow you to successfully navigate the rules of 2 countries and maximise your outcomes
  • Providing you with retirement projections given the possible different scenarios
  • Determining if your family has any insurance gaps given the tax treatment of death and total & permanent disablement benefits payable from a UK pension
  • Reviewing your estate planning arrangements
Contact our experts Keep me informed
